languages.text: "Они это сделают, но по своим причинам: избрание нового префекта ввергнет чиновников в бумажный кошмар. Администратум не захочет повторения ситуации".

traits.locale_text: "Они это сделают, но по своим причинам: избрание нового префекта ввергнет чиновников в бумажный кошмар. Администратум не захочет повторения ситуации".

languages.text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
languages.original_text: "Они это сделают, но по своим причинам: избрание нового префекта ввергнет чиновников в бумажный кошмар. Администратум не захочет повторения ситуации".

traits.locale_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
"They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
"They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
"They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
"They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
"They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

languages.text: 「彼らはそうするだろうが、それはあくまで自分たちの都合からだ。新たな総監が選ばれれば、書類地獄が待っている。帝国行政局は、あんな面倒を二度と繰り返したくはないはずだ」
languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはそうするだろうが、それはあくまで自分たちの都合からだ。新たな総監が選ばれれば、書類地獄が待っている。帝国行政局は、あんな面倒を二度と繰り返したくはないはずだ」

languages.text: "Das werden sie, doch aus ihren eigenen Gründen: Sobald ein neuer Präfekt gewählt wird, beginnt ein bürokratischer Albtraum. Das wird das Administratum nicht erneut durchmachen wollen."
languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

traits.locale_text: "Das werden sie, doch aus ihren eigenen Gründen: Sobald ein neuer Präfekt gewählt wird, beginnt ein bürokratischer Albtraum. Das wird das Administratum nicht erneut durchmachen wollen."

languages.text: « Il le fera, mais pour ses propres raisons : la nomination d'un nouveau préfet est un véritable cauchemar bureaucratique. L'Administratum fera tout pour éviter que ça se reproduise. »
languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

traits.locale_text: « Il le fera, mais pour ses propres raisons : la nomination d'un nouveau préfet est un véritable cauchemar bureaucratique. L'Administratum fera tout pour éviter que ça se reproduise. »

languages.text: «Sí que lo harán, pero por sus propios motivos: cuando se elija a un nuevo prefecto, será una pesadilla burocrática. El Administratum no querrá volver a pasar por eso».
languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

traits.locale_text: «Sí que lo harán, pero por sus propios motivos: cuando se elija a un nuevo prefecto, será una pesadilla burocrática. El Administratum no querrá volver a pasar por eso».

languages.text: “他们会吸取教训的，但却是出于他们自己的原因——一旦推举了新的行政官，必定会带来一场官僚主义的噩梦，内政部已经不想再经历这样的事情了。”
languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

traits.locale_text: “他们会吸取教训的，但却是出于他们自己的原因——一旦推举了新的行政官，必定会带来一场官僚主义的噩梦，内政部已经不想再经历这样的事情了。”

languages.text: "Alır ama kendi menfaatleri için alır. Yeni prefektin seçilme süreci, başlı başına bürokratik bir kâbus. Administratum, bu eziyete tekrar katlanmak istemez."
languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."

traits.locale_text: "Alır ama kendi menfaatleri için. Yeni prefektin seçilme süreci, başlı başına bürokratik bir kâbus. Administratum, bu eziyete tekrar katlanmak istemez."

languages.original_text: "They will do that, but for their own reasons: once a new prefect is chosen, it's going to be a bureaucratic nightmare. The Administratum will not want to go through that again."
